articles.description: England's defeat in Belgium leaves qualification for the Olympic Games in doubt as their weaknesses are exposed yet again.
articles.title: Lionesses exposed as Olympics qualification in doubt

articles.description: Much-changed Scotland remain without a win and rooted to the bottom of Nations League Group A1 after their second defeat by the Netherlands in four days.
articles.title: Brugts wonder strike sinks Scots at Hampden

articles.description: An indoor "high-tech golf league" - launched by Tiger Woods and Rory McIlroy and backed by Stephen Curry and the Williams sisters - starts on 9 January.
articles.title: Woods and McIlroy golf league launches in January

articles.description: Hosting a men's World Cup has long been an ambition for Saudi Arabia writes BBC sports editor Dan Roan, but questions and intense scrutiny will remain.
articles.title: Why Saudi 2034 World Cup should not surprise anyone

articles.description: Danielle Maxwell scores a superb equaliser as Northern Ireland draw 1-1 with Hungary in Group B1 in the Nations League at Seaview.
articles.title: Maxwell stunner saves NI against Hungary

articles.description: Middlesbrough reach the Carabao Cup quarter-finals after a thrilling 3-2 win at League One side Exeter City.
articles.title: Boro survive Exeter scare to make quarter-finals

articles.description: Watch highlights as Pakistan easily beat Bangladesh by seven-wickets in Kolkata to knock the Tigers out of the Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: Pakistan win comfortably to knock out Bangladesh

articles.description: Mercedes chief technical officer Mike Elliott leaves the team after 11 years following a disappointing 2023 campaign.
articles.title: Chief technical officer Elliott leaves Mercedes

articles.description: England's hopes of progressing in the Women's Nations League are dealt a huge blow after a late defeat in Belgium.
articles.title: England beaten by Belgium in Women's Nations League

articles.description: Hibernian pass up the chance to move into the Scottish Premiership's top six by surrendering a two-goal lead at home to Ross County in a thrilling draw at Easter Road.
articles.title: Hibs lose two-goal lead in thrilling draw with County
